title: Psychron watch face
summary: Its a nice scifi style watchface.  With the look of future! Science fiction! HUD
description: Psychron is the most wonderful scifi style watchface with the look of Future.NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.Link to Pro version http://goo.gl/DVAZcXFeatures on one face:✔ 3D Parallax effect (To be enabled in settings)✔ Launch screen animation✔ Compass✔ Weather icon✔ Temperature (Fahrenheit and Celsius)✔ Rotating circle animation✔ Rotating seconds✔ Watch/phone battery level✔ Step count triggered per hour ✔ Month, Date and Day✔ Hexagon background✔ Color picker for outer circle contour✔ Color picker for weather icon✔ Display in dimmed modeSupport all models:✔ LG G Watch R✔ Motorola Moto 360✔ Samsung Gear Live✔ Asus Zen Watch✔ LG G watch✔ Sony SmartWatch 3Weather support: http://openweathermap.org/How to launch:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press the watch screen and select Psychron from the watch face picker3. You might need to wait a second before the app is synced for both phone and watch.It's the first one of our scifi series. Stay tuned for our next watch face.
descriptionHTML:
Psychron is the most wonderful scifi style watchface with the look of Future.
NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.
Link to Pro version http://goo.gl/DVAZcX


Features on one face:
✔ 3D Parallax effect (To be enabled in settings)
✔ Launch screen animation
✔ Compass
✔ Weather icon
✔ Temperature (Fahrenheit and Celsius)
✔ Rotating circle animation
✔ Rotating seconds
✔ Watch/phone battery level
✔ Step count triggered per hour
✔ Month, Date and Day
✔ Hexagon background
✔ Color picker for outer circle contour
✔ Color picker for weather icon
✔ Display in dimmed mode


Support all models:
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ Motorola Moto 360
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Asus Zen Watch
✔ LG G watch
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3


Weather support:
http://openweathermap.org/


How to launch:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press the watch screen and select Psychron from the watch face picker
3. You might need to wait a second before the app is synced for both phone and watch.


It's the first one of our scifi series. Stay tuned for our next watch face.
comments: It looks pretty, but it performs poorly, at least on my ZenWatch.  Its laggy, and the face is so small, that you can't see anything, because its a round face forced to fit screen on a square screen.  Description stated that this face is compatible with square watches, it most assuredly is not.
So you can pay to unlock features. Oh and pay to go to the pro version. So $4.00 for a fully functional watch face. It's nice but it's not $4.00 nice.
You can't even change the temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius without paying, absurd.
Looks great, can't do anything without paying..  Not even change the units for the temperature..
Psychron review Nice interface display on my Moto 360. So far so good.
Gene Fish Does not fill the whole face on my Sony SM3.
recentChanges: 1. Only show app on device with Android 4.3 and up
2. Fixed display issue of ambient mode on Zen watch.
